Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) when the log is collected by Azure Spring Cloud
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The service name that emitted the log
Columns.Name: ServiceName

Columns.Description: The application name that emitted the log
Columns.Name: AppName

Columns.Description: The instance name that emitted the log
Columns.Name: InstanceName

Columns.Description: The log timestamp (UTC) from user application log
Columns.Name: AppTimestamp

Columns.Description: The logger from user application log
Columns.Name: Logger

Columns.Description: Customized MDC field in the log
Columns.Name: MDC

Columns.Description: The name of the operation represented by this event
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
